name: Calvary Presbyterian Church Nursery School
description: Calvary NURSERY SCHOOL has been a cornerstone of the San Francisco community since 1954. For over seventy years, our preschool and pre-kindergarten programs have emphasized child-initiated play, inquiry, and curiosity within a nurturing and respectful environment. Calvary provides a supportive community where children and families can thrive during the early childhood years. Calvary graduates emerge well-prepared for kindergarten, with a foundation for a lifelong love of friendship and learning.
